name: Bluebird Motel
description: A charming roadside motel, offering a comfortable night's rest for weary travelers. The Bluebird Motel boasts a neon sign that flickers invitingly, promising 'Clean Rooms, Color TV, Air Conditioning'. The air is filled with the faint scent of fresh linen and the distant hum of traffic. A friendly proprietor, with a welcoming smile, is ready to hand you a key to your temporary home away from home.
